intro: Psychotria costularia, commonly known as the "Costularia Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. The plant typically grows as an erect shrub, reaching heights of up to 1.5 meters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often have a velvety texture. The flowers are small, clustered in inflorescences, and usually have a white or pale pink color.
